protein.general_function: Involved in receptor signaling protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: On ligand binding, forms a receptor complex consisting of two type II and two type I transmembrane serine/threonine kinases. Type II receptors phosphorylate and activate type I receptors which autophosphorylate, then bind and activate SMAD transcriptional regulators. Receptor for activin A, activin B and inhibin A

go_class.description: transmembrane receptor protein serine/threonine kinase activity
transforming growth factor beta receptor activity
receptor signaling protein serine/threonine kinase activity
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
enzyme linked receptor protein signaling pathway
transmembrane receptor protein serine/threonine kinase signaling pathway

Donaldson CJ, Mathews LS, Vale WW: Molecular cloning and binding properties of the human type II activin receptor. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1992 Apr 15;184(1):310-6.
